Python Module for Finite Rate of Innovation (FRI) sampling 1.0.0 documentation
previous | next | modules | index

plotter API¶

plotter.delete_data(name)¶

This function is used to delete the stored data in the results file

To know what are the currently stored simulations, run retrieve_data().

name: str
name of the simulation that needs to be deleted.
plotter.fetch_data(name)¶

retrieves dictionary of given simulation name

The name of the simulation was given when using save_results on the object. To see the currently saved results, run retrieve_data()

name: str
name of the wanted simulation
dic
the corresponding dictionary
plotter.plot_data(name, save_fig=False, fig_format='png')¶

Method used to plot data directly from the results file

name: str
name of the reconstruction
save_fig: bool
saves the plots if True is given.
fig_format: str
specifies the fig format, using matplotlib.pyplot.savefig.
plotter.plot_four_samp(name, save_fig, fig_format)¶

plotter for the IrrFourSamp class

This plotter plots plots the results of the named reconstruction.

name: str
name of the reconstruction
save_fig: bool
saves the plots if True is given.
fig_format: str
specifies the fig format, using matplotlib.pyplot.savefig.
plotter.plot_friCurve(name, save_fig, fig_format)¶

plotter for the IrrFourSamp class

This plotter plots plots the results of the named reconstruction.

name: str
name of the reconstruction
save_fig: bool
saves the plots if True is given.
fig_format: str
specifies the fig format, using matplotlib.pyplot.savefig.
plotter.plot_irreg_samp(name, save_fig, fig_format)¶

plotter for the irrTimeSamp class

This plotter plots plots the results of the named reconstruction. It also plots the original diracs and signal if default G matrix and a measurements were given.

name: str
name of the reconstruction
save_fig: bool
saves the plots if True is given.
fig_format: str
specifies the fig format, using matplotlib.pyplot.savefig.
plotter.retrieve_data()¶

this method is used to display the data stored in the results file

data_names: list
list of the names of all the saved results
